metrics.question_fairness:
Is the prediction to be done by the model fair in how it is formulated or not?
The higher this value the fairer we consider the question being asked.
metrics.class_balance:
How well is the training data balanced or not?
The higher this value the more balanced the training data is.
metrics.underfitting:
Is the model underfitting?
The higher this value the less underfitting was detected.
metrics.overfitting:
Is the model overfitting?
The higher this value the less overfitting was detected.
metrics.statistical_parity_difference: How many percent more from the majority class receive a favorable outcome compared to the protected group.
metrics.equal_opportunity_difference: Difference in true positive rates between protected and unprotected group.
metrics.average_odds_difference: Is the average of difference in false positive rates and true positive rates between the protected and unprotected group
